message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'd be interested in. It's valued at $120 to you, and I'm offering it for $115.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $110 is a good price, but I'm still hoping to get closer to $115. Would you be willing to pay $112.50? That's halfway between our last two offers.
I understand your position, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me at $110?
